description: A BBC documentary investigates why Nazi scholar Dr Ludwig M¨¹hlhausen was in the Donegal Gaeltacht.
title: The Nazi who planned a UK invasion via the Donegal Gaeltacht
title_page: The Nazi who planned a UK invasion via the Donegal Gaeltacht - BBC News
maintext: While in the south Donegal area, he took many photographs and measured the depth of Teelin Bay by dropping lead weights into the tide, forcing locals to later speculate that he was scouting the place out as a potential landing site for Nazi U-boats.
